body.p: I have been shown a Petition asking your to pardon Milton G Mize who stands indict for counterfeiting. I can not say whether he is Guilty or not as I know nothing of the circumstances of the Case I can say to you that I have been well acquired with Mr. Mize for the last 25 years & that I never heard any thing disrespectful of him out side of this Case & hope you may pardon him.

Youts
A B Patrick Clerk of Breathitt Circuit & County Courts
A. B. Patrick.
